summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing for SPX Cascade module (D1 Extended). All specified endpoints and validation scenarios are working correctly. Module successfully implements DXY/AE → SPX overlay with proper guard policies, multipliers, and direction preservation.

public_url_routing.issue: Public URL returns 404 for all API endpoints
public_url_routing.impact: Users cannot access SPX Cascade API through public URL

service_status.issue: Frontend service is in FATAL state - exited too quickly

passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/spx/cascade?focus=30d - cascade-only data with DXY/AE inputs
GET /api/fractal/spx/terminal?focus=30d - full terminal with cascade section
No NaN or negative values in multipliers validation
DXY and AE inputs populated validation
Guard caps validation: BLOCK=0.0, CRISIS=0.4, WARN=0.75
Cascade multiplier factors validation (mStress, mPersist, mNovel, mScenario)

action_item_for_main_agent.public_url_routing: Investigate and fix public URL routing for SPX Cascade endpoints - all /api/fractal/spx/* return 404 on https://dxy-risk-overlay.preview.emergentagent.com but work on localhost:8002
action_item_for_main_agent.port_configuration: Backend is running on port 8002 instead of expected port 8001 - verify port configuration and ingress rules
action_item_for_main_agent.frontend_service: Fix frontend service FATAL status if frontend access is needed (currently not required for backend-only testing)
